```
    11→  () => import('@/app/components/DrenjariButtonBarDriggsmanLinks'),
    12→  { ssr: false }
    13→);
    14→
    15→export default function DriggsmanClient() {
    16→  const { user } = useAuth();
    17→  const router = useRouter();
    18→  const [isHeaderVisible, setIsHeaderVisible] = useState<boolean>(() => {
    19→    // Initialize from localStorage with default as false (hidden)
    20→    if (typeof window !== 'undefined') {
    21→      const saved = localStorage.getItem('driggsman-header-visible');
    22→      return saved === null ? false : saved === 'true';
    23→    }
    24→    return false;
    25→  });
    26→
    27→  // Controls state for pagination and search
    28→  const [paginationControls, setPaginationControls] = useState<{
    29→    PaginationControls: () => JSX.Element;
    30→    ColumnPaginationControls: () => JSX.Element;
    31→  } | null>(null);
    32→
    33→  // Button states moved from DriggsmanTable
    34→  const [showVerificationColumn, setShowVerificationColumn] = useState(false);
    35→  const [showCompetitorSites, setShowCompetitorSites] = useState(false);
    36→  const [sitesCount, setSitesCount] = useState(0);
    37→
    38→  useEffect(() => {
    39→    if (!user) {
    40→      router.push('/login');
    41→      return;
    42→    }
    43→  }, [user, router]);
    44→
    45→  // Save header visibility state to localStorage and update body class
    46→  useEffect(() => {
    47→    localStorage.setItem('driggsman-header-visible', isHeaderVisible.toString());
    48→    
    49→    // Add/remove class on body to hide main header
    50→    if (isHeaderVisible) {
    51→      document.body.classList.remove('driggsman-hide-main-header');
    52→    } else {
    53→      document.body.classList.add('driggsman-hide-main-header');
    54→    }
    55→    
    56→    // Cleanup on unmount
    57→    return () => {
    58→      document.body.classList.remove('driggsman-hide-main-header');
    59→    };
    60→  }, [isHeaderVisible]);
    61→
    62→  if (!user) {
    63→    return (
    64→      <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex items-center justify-center">
    65→        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading...</div>
    66→      </div>
    67→    );
    68→  }
    69→
    70→  return (
    71→    <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex flex-col">
    72→      {/* Hide/Show Header Button and Navigation */}
    73→      <div className="px-6 py-1 bg-gray-50 flex items-center space-x-4">
    74→        <button
    75→          onClick={() => setIsHeaderVisible(!isHeaderVisible)}
    76→          className="px-3 py-1 text-sm bg-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-300 rounded transition-colors"
    77→        >
    78→          {isHeaderVisible ? 'Hide Page Header' : 'Show Page Header'}
    79→        </button>
    80→        
    81→        {/* Drenjari Navigation Links */}
    82→        <div>
    83→          <DrenjariButtonBarDriggsmanLinks />
    84→        </div>
    85→
    86→        {/* Verification and Competitor Buttons */}
    87→        <div className="flex items-center space-x-2">
    88→          <button
    89→            onClick={() => setShowVerificationColumn(!showVerificationColumn)}
    90→            className={`px-3 py-1 text-sm rounded transition-colors ${
    91→              showVerificationColumn ? 'bg-blue-200 hover:bg-blue-300' : 'bg-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-300'
    92→            }`}
    93→          >
    94→            show verification column
    95→          </button>
    96→          <button
    97→            onClick={() => setShowCompetitorSites(!showCompetitorSites)}
    98→            className={`px-3 py-1 text-sm rounded transition-colors ${
    99→              showCompetitorSites ? 'bg-blue-200 hover:bg-blue-300' : 'bg-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-300'
   100→            }`}
   101→          >
   102→            show competitor sites
   103→          </button>
   104→        </div>
   105→      </div>
   106→      {/* Pagination and Search Controls */}
   107→      {paginationControls && (
   108→        <div className="px-6 py-1 bg-white border-b">
   109→          <div className="flex items-center space-x-6">
   110→            <span className="px-3 py-1 bg-blue-50 text-blue-700 rounded text-sm">
   111→              {sitesCount} sites loaded
   112→            </span>
   113→            <div className="flex items-center">
   114→              {paginationControls.PaginationControls()}
   115→            </div>
   116→            <div className="flex items-center">
   117→              {paginationControls.ColumnPaginationControls()}
   118→            </div>
   119→          </div>
   120→        </div>
   121→      )}
   122→
   123→      {/* Main Content - Full Width DriggsmanTable */}
```

```
    11→
    12→  useEffect(() => {
    13→    if (!user) {
    14→      router.push('/login');
    15→      return;
    16→    }
    17→  }, [user, router]);
    18→
    19→  if (!user) {
    20→    return (
    21→      <div className="min-h-screen bg-gray-50 flex items-center justify-center">
    22→        <div className="text-gray-500">Loading...</div>
    23→      </div>
```

```
1→'use client';
     2→
     3→import { useState, useEffect, useMemo } from 'react';
     4→import { createClientComponentClient } from '@supabase/auth-helpers-nextjs';
     5→import dynamic from 'next/dynamic';
     6→import DriggsPacksExpandEditor from '@/app/components/shared/DriggsPacksExpandEditor';
     7→
     8→const NubraTablefaceKite = dynamic(
     9→  () => import('@/app/utils/nubra-tableface-kite').then(mod => ({ default: mod.NubraTablefaceKite })),
    10→  { ssr: false }
    11→);
    12→
    13→interface DriggsPacksRecord {
    14→  dpack_id: number;
    15→  dpack_datum: string | null;
    16→  dpack_note: string | null;
    17→  created_at: string;
    18→  updated_at: string | null;
    19→}
    20→
    21→export default function DriggsPacksTable() {
    22→  const [data, setData] = useState<DriggsPacksRecord[]>([]);
    23→  const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true);
    24→  const [error, setError] = useState<string | null>(null);
    25→  const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState('');
    26→  const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
    27→  const [itemsPerPage, setItemsPerPage] = useState(100);
    28→  const [selectedRows, setSelectedRows] = useState<Set<number>>(new Set());
    29→  const [sortField, setSortField] = useState<keyof DriggsPacksRecord>('created_at');
    30→  const [sortOrder, setSortOrder] = useState<'asc' | 'desc'>('desc');
    31→  
    32→  // Modal states
    33→  const [isCreateModalOpen, setIsCreateModalOpen] = useState(false);
    34→  const [isEditModalOpen, setIsEditModalOpen] = useState(false);
    35→  const [editingRecord, setEditingRecord] = useState<DriggsPacksRecord | null>(null);
    36→  
    37→  // Inline editing states
    38→  const [editingCell, setEditingCell] = useState<{ id: number; field: string } | null>(null);
    39→  const [editingValue, setEditingValue] = useState<string>('');
    40→  
    41→  // Expand popup states
    42→  const [expandPopup, setExpandPopup] = useState<{ dpackId: number } | null>(null);
    43→  
    44→  // Form data for creating/editing
    45→  const [formData, setFormData] = useState({
    46→    dpack_datum: '',
    47→    dpack_note: ''
    48→  });
    49→
    50→  const supabase = createClientComponentClient();
    51→
    52→  // Fetch data from Supabase
    53→  const fetchData = async () => {
    54→    try {
    55→      setLoading(true);
    56→      setError(null);
    57→      
    58→      const { data: fetchedData, error } = await supabase
    59→        .from('driggs_packs')
    60→        .select('*')
    61→        .order('created_at', { ascending: false });
    62→
    63→      if (error) throw error;
    64→      
    65→      setData(fetchedData || []);
    66→    } catch (err: any) {
    67→      setError(err.message);
    68→    } finally {
    69→      setLoading(false);
    70→    }
    71→  };
    72→
    73→  useEffect(() => {
    74→    fetchData();
    75→  }, []);
    76→
    77→  // Filter and sort data
    78→  const filteredAndSortedData = useMemo(() => {
    79→    let filtered = data.filter(item => {
    80→      if (!searchTerm.trim()) return true;
    81→      return Object.values(item).some(value => 
    82→        value?.toString().toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase())
    83→      );
    84→    });
    85→
    86→    // Sort data
    87→    filtered = filtered.sort((a, b) => {
    88→      const aValue = a[sortField];
    89→      const bValue = b[sortField];
    90→      
    91→      if (aValue === null && bValue === null) return 0;
    92→      if (aValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
    93→      if (bValue === null) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
    94→      
    95→      if (aValue < bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? -1 : 1;
    96→      if (aValue > bValue) return sortOrder === 'asc' ? 1 : -1;
    97→      return 0;
    98→    });
    99→
   100→    return filtered;
```

## /driggsman Page Analysis:

**Core Functionality:**
- Main business site management interface for managing multiple websites/domains
- Displays comprehensive business data including contact info, addresses, industries, etc.
- Supports bulk operations, filtering, verification workflows
- Has advanced features like vacuum operations, scraping data, and exclusion management

**Key Database Tables Used by /driggsman (in order of importance):**

1. **`sitespren`** - Primary table containing all website/domain records with comprehensive business data
2. **`users`** - User authentication and authorization 
3. **`sitespren_vacuums`** - Vacuum operation data mirroring sitespren records
4. **`sitespren_zarpscrapes`** - Scraping data mirroring sitespren records
5. **`call_platforms`** - Phone platform configurations
6. **`citation_gigs`** - Citation service configurations
7. **`address_species`** - Address format templates
8. **`sitespren_tags_relations`** - Tag relationships for sites
9. **`sitespren_exclude_from_wp`** - WordPress exclusion data
10. **`sitespren_exclude_from_frontend`** - Frontend exclusion data

## /dpackjar Page Analysis:

**Core Functionality:**
- Simple data management interface for "driggs packs"
- CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) on text-based records
- Search and pagination functionality
- Inline editing capabilities

**Key Database Tables Used by /dpackjar:**

1. **`driggs_packs`** - Primary and only table used, containing:
   - `dpack_id` (primary key)
   - `dpack_datum` (main text content)
   - `dpack_note` (additional notes)
   - `created_at` and `updated_at` timestamps

- Boolean flags for feature toggles/states
- Comprehensive business data modeling in `sitespren`

␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀␀�PNG
